firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of all Minions in play.
name: Exterminator
ability: You start knowing which Minions are in play.
flavor: Don't knock the power of a pest. Persistence and stubbornness can be useful in many situations.

firstNightReminder: If a player is marked with the Farrier's "Chosen" and
otherNightReminder: The Farrier points to a player. Mark that player with the "Chosen" reminder. If the previously chosen player is marked with the "Talked" reminder, wake that player and show the Farrier character token.
name: Farrier
ability: Each night, choose a player: if you have a private conversation with them tomorrow, that night they learn they spoke to the Farrier.
flavor: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make him drink.

name: Eavesdropper
ability: Each night*, you learn if a private conversation that day consisted only of evil players.

otherNightReminder: Show the character tokens of the players the Tailor talked to along with an additional incorrect character token.
name: Tailor
ability: Each night*, you learn which characters you had private conversations with, and an additional incorrect character.
flavor: Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence on society.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon is marked with the "Accused" reminder, the J'Accuse dies.
name: J'Accuse
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, you die that night.
flavor: I have but one passion: to enlighten those who have been kept in the dark, in the name of humanity which has suffered so much and is entitled to happiness. My fiery protest is simpy the cry of my very soul.

otherNightReminder: If the Hostess is marked with the "Talked to evil" reminder, they die.
name: Hostess
ability: If you are involved in a private conversation with an evil player, you die tonight.

otherNightReminder: If no one is marked with the Twitter's "Talked" reminder, the Twitter dies.
name: Twitter
ability: Each night*, if you did not have a private conversation today, you die.

firstNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player. Mark that player with the "Chosen" reminder.
otherNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player. Mark that player with the "Chosen" reminder. If a player is marked with the "Talked" reminder, ask the Succubus if they want that player to die.
name: Succubus
ability: Each night, choose a player: if you have a private conversation with them tomorrow, you may choose to kill them that night.
flavor: Sometimes you wake up from a dream. Sometimes you wake up in a dream. And sometimes, every once in a while, you wake up in someone else's dream.

otherNightReminder: If no living player was executed during the day: The Cheesemonger points to player. That player dies.
name: Cheesemonger
ability: Each night*, if no living player was executed during the day, choose a player: they die.
flavor: What happens to the hole when the cheese is gone?

otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned players are no longer poisoned. Any players marked with the "Talked" reminder are now poisoned.
name: Grima
ability: The first 2 Townsfolk you have private conversations with are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
flavor: Oh, but this order does not come from me. It comes from the King.

name: Turncoat
ability: There is an extra Minion in play. 1 good player knows a Turncoat is in play. [+1 Minion]
flavor: Our doubts are traitors and make us lose the good we oft might win by fearing to attempt.

firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
